source.04a54d6c:
top = df.groupby(by=['Country_Name']).sum().groupby(level=[0]).cumsum().drop('Year',axis=1)
top5 = top.sort_values(by="Gold",ascending=False).head(10)

top5.plot(kind="bar",figsize=(20, 10))

plt.xticks(rotation=90)
plt.grid(True)
plt.show()
